parents.title: Execute contract: 697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002
parents.description:
TASK: CONTRACT_EXECUTE

task_id: 697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002
contract_ref: docs/ssot/04_contracts/generated/697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002.json

Goal:
- Implement the contract goal by editing only within contract.scope_allow.
- Run contract.acceptance.checks and ensure they PASS.

Rules (mandatory):
- MUST stay within allowlisted paths (scope_allow).
- MUST follow SSOT: read `docs/START_HERE.md` then `docs/ssot/registry.json` when unsure.
- MUST NOT create a second docs entrypoint.
- If acceptance cannot be run deterministically, STOP and report (do not guess).
- Output MUST be a unified diff patch ONLY (no markdown/code fences, no narration).
- Patch MUST start with `diff --git a/<path> b/<path>` so it can be applied via `git apply`.
- IMPORTANT: unified diff hunks MUST use a standard hunk header with ranges, e.g. `@@ -12,7 +12,9 @@` (NOT just `@@`).
- IMPORTANT: inside hunks, every line MUST start with exactly one of: ` ` (context), `+` (add), `-` (remove).
- If no changes are needed, STOP and report (do not invent changes).

Outputs (mandatory):
- Patch must apply cleanly; acceptance must pass.

parents.title: Verify contract acceptance: 697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002
parents.description:
TASK: CONTRACT_VERIFY

task_id: 697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002
contract_ref: docs/ssot/04_contracts/generated/697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002.json

Goal:
- Run contract.acceptance.checks exactly and report pass/fail with evidence.

Rules (mandatory):
- Do NOT edit code.
- If checks are not executable, STOP and report.
